name: A Telegram Footer Bot by @AbirHasan2005.
description: A Telegram Bot for adding Footer caption beside main caption of Telegram Channel Messages. Best for Telegram Movie Channels. Made by @AbirHasan2005.

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

MONGODB_URI.description: MongoDB URI for Saving Chat Settings. Video Tutorial Here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aXlF80Cn7iU

CHAT_ID_FORWARD.description: A Telegram Logs Channel ID for some trace.
